ygData.subject: Innoruuk's Bane Site
ygData.msgSnippet: I have just started a site for Innoruuk s Bane. It is another YahooClub, because I find it an excellent setup with a very handy message board system as well as
ygData.messageBody:
I have just started a site for Innoruuk's Bane.
It is another YahooClub, because I find it an
excellent setup with a very handy message board system as
well as the pictures, calanders, and chat rooms.
Anyway, the site is at
<a href=http://clubs.yahoo.com/clubs/innoruuksbane target=new>http://clubs.yahoo.com/clubs/innoruuksbane</a> . It is primarily for the members of the guild,
but others are welcome to come on in and look around,
especially if you wish to join =) I warn you, this site is
still under HEAVY CONSTRUCTION! There is hardly a thing
there because I literally created it 30 seconds ago, so
don't be scared off by the lack of stuff. Just wanted
to let you know.<br><br>Trellan Hawksight, Wood Elf
Ranger of 22 seasons and follower of Innoruuk's Bane.
